mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HNYC_CIG_INFO (cig_code, cig_name, cig_helper, cig_trademark, bar_code, hbar_code, xbar_code, cig_newsign, tar, nicotine, factory, cig_state, class_code, package_type, package_code, cig_category, manufacturer, status) VALUES ( #{cig_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cig_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cig_helper, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cig_trademark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bar_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hbar_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xbar_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cig_newsign, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tar, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nicotine, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cig_state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{class_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{package_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{package_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cig_category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacturer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HNYC_CIG_INFO SET cig_name = #{cig_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cig_helper = #{cig_helper, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cig_trademark = #{cig_trademark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bar_code = #{bar_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hbar_code = #{hbar_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xbar_code = #{xbar_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cig_newsign = #{cig_newsign, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tar = #{tar, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, nicotine = #{nicotine, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, factory = #{factory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cig_state = #{cig_state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_code = #{class_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_type = #{package_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_code = #{package_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cig_category = #{cig_category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE cig_code = #{cig_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
